Class Jtest

java.lang.Object
Jtesting.Jtest
public class Jtest extends Object
A test class for validating user input validation operations.

This class contains unit tests that verify the proper functionality of input validation for:

  • User names (first and last)
  • Email addresses
  • Usernames
  • Passwords

Each test method follows a consistent pattern:

  1. Setting up test input
  2. Executing the validation
  3. Verifying the expected validation results
See Also:
  • NameRecognizer
  • EmailRecognizer
  • UserNameRecognizer
  • PasswordEvaluator

  • Method Details

    • testNameEvaluatorValid

      @Test public void testNameEvaluatorValid()
      Tests the name evaluator with valid first and last names.

      This test verifies that the name evaluator correctly accepts valid names and returns an empty string indicating no errors.

      See Also:
      • NameRecognizer.nameEvaluator(String, String)

    • testNameEvaluatorNull

      @Test public void testNameEvaluatorNull()
      Tests the name evaluator with null values.

      This test verifies that the name evaluator correctly identifies null values and returns an appropriate error message.

      See Also:
      • NameRecognizer.nameEvaluator(String, String)

    • testPasswordEvaluatorValid

      @Test public void testPasswordEvaluatorValid()
      Test a valid password. A valid password has at least 8 characters, contains at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one numeric digit, one underscore, and does not contain any blocked substrings.
